pr_title: [FLINK-17391][filesystem] rolling-policy interval default value should be bigger

timeline.message: [FLINK-17391][filesystem] sink.rolling-policy.time.interval default value should be bigger

timeline.bodyText:
how about "time duration" -> interval time ?
which can keep the option align
timeline.author: leonardBang

replies.bodyText: I write "time duration" to provide an another explaintion to let user better understand it.
replies.author: JingsongLi
